overview: From the producer of Terrifier 2 comes a new installment of All Hallows Eve the franchise that brought the world Art the Clown. It's Halloween and a new breed of monster is on the loose. When a woman stops at a gas station on Halloween, she is kidnapped by a group of hellish monsters and taken to meet the devil himself. Get ready for a night you will never forget.
title: All Hallows Eve Trickster
